title: Manmohini Emerald & Diamond Jhumka: A Timeless Treasure
materials: Cultured Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Exquisite openwork Jhumka design inspired by traditional South Indian temple architecture. The ear studs feature a central pear-shaped emerald, surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds and ornate gold filigree. The dome-shaped jhumkas showcase an intricate floral lattice pattern, with rows of pav√©-set diamonds adding brilliance. Delicate pearl drops enhance the feminine charm of the earrings.
colors: Dominant Gold (Bangaru) with vibrant Emerald Green and dazzling White Diamonds. The soft luster of the pearls complements the overall color palette.
occasions: and special occasions. Ideal for Muhurtham
and other traditional South Indian celebrations. Can also be paired with contemporary outfits for a touch of ethnic elegance.
description: A true testament to Hyderabadi craftsmanship, these Jhumkas blend tradition with modern sophistication. The high-quality emeralds and diamonds offer exceptional brilliance. These earrings are meticulously handcrafted and represent a valuable investment for generations to cherish. The openwork design ensures comfortable wear while making a bold statement.
